item.source: H.A.M cave entrace is not working

item.title: H.A.M cave entrace is not working
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:3, topic:540514”]You will need to manipulate the response from the object action 1 packet. Compare the received ID against the cave entrance, then teleport the player if necessary.

You may also want to check to make sure the player is near the object using pythagoras’ theorem for packet validity verification.

A little pseudo-code,

if (objId == ENTRANCE_ID && player.getPosition().distanceTo(objPos) < 4) { player.teleport(ENTRANCE_POSITION); }[/quote]

…Dude all he has to do is add a case for that object ID. Im pretty sure that the server he is using already has packet handling and interactions

Read full topic
item.source: H.A.M cave entrace is not working

item.title: H.A.M cave entrace is not working
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You will need to manipulate the response from the object action 1 packet. Compare the received ID against the cave entrance, then teleport the player if necessary.

You may also want to check to make sure the player is near the object using pythagoras’ theorem for packet validity verification.

A little pseudo-code,

if (objId == ENTRANCE_ID && player.getPosition().distanceTo(objPos) < 4) { player.teleport(ENTRANCE_POSITION); }

Read full topic
